mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message ( message_num, room_num, sender_num, content, sent_at ) VALUES ( chat_message_seq.nextval, #{room_num}, #{sender_num}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT m.message_num, m.room_num, m.sender_num, m.content, TO_CHAR(m.sent_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as sent_at, u.user_name as sender_name FROM chat_message m LEFT JOIN euser_detail u ON m.sender_num = u.user_num WHERE m.room_num = #{chat_room} ORDER BY m.sent_at ASC

SELECT m.message_num, m.room_num, m.sender_num, m.content, TO_CHAR(m.sent_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as sent_at, u.user_name as sender_name FROM chat_message m LEFT JOIN euser_detail u ON m.sender_num = u.user_num WHERE m.room_num = #{room_num} AND m.message_num > #{lastMessageId} ORDER BY m.sent_at ASC
